entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 March 2023
